title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Why Is Bitcoin Down? Blame Trump, Says Economist Paul Krugman
contentSnippet: Bitcoin critic Krugman says it's no coincidence that BTC is down, just as crypto-friendly President Trump stumbles in the polls.

title: CryptoQuant says big bitcoin holders increased deposits to exchanges as prices fell
contentSnippet: The firm noted that exchange activity in ETH and altcoins also remained elevated, putting further downward pressure on prices.

title: New UAE Sweeping Banking Decree Looks to Cement Country’s Global Crypto Position
contentSnippet: UAE’s new financial law brings crypto and blockchain into traditional finance and under Central Bank’s supervision.

title: Securitize wins EU approval to operate tokenized trading and settlement system, selects Avalanche
contentSnippet: The approval lets Securitize operate at the market-infrastructure layer, going beyond its earlier brokerage and transfer-agent permissions.

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT Stability to 'Weak' Due to Bitcoin Backing Concerns
contentSnippet: S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Tether's USDT, warning that the industry-leading stablecoin could suffer if Bitcoin's price crashes. Tether disagrees.

title: APT Trades Little Changed, Undeperforms Wider Crypto Market Rally
contentSnippet: The token has support around the $2.16 level and resistance at $2.31.

title: Xapo Bank expands bitcoin credit fund as it develops ‘suite of BTC wealth products’
contentSnippet: Launched in 2013, Xapo also offers bitcoin-backed U.S. dollar loans of up to $1 million and interest-bearing bitcoin and fiat accounts.

title: Post-XRP ETF launch, Franklin Templeton sees diversified crypto portfolios as the next big thing
contentSnippet: Bloomberg Senior ETF analyst Eric Balchunas predicts over 100 new crypto ETFs will launch in the next six months.

title: Bitcoin Reclaims $90K Ahead of Thanksgiving as Ethereum, XRP Bounce Back
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has broken above $90,000 per coin again, nearly a week after it dipped to a seven-month low of about $81,000.

title: The Daily: Robinhood takes aim at larger prediction-market share, Grayscale files to launch first-ever Zcash ETF, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Nasdaq ISE Files to Lift BlackRock IBIT Option Limits Into Top Tier Status
contentSnippet: Filing comes amid rapid growth in IBIT options activity and a migration of open interest toward US regulated venues.

title: House Democrats Issue Report Detailing Trump Crypto Ties as 'New Age of Corruption'
contentSnippet: Democratic staff on the House Judiciary Committee gathered data on President Donald Trump's crypto businesses that reportedly gained his family massive wealth.

title: Bitcoin Retakes $90K in Break From Typical Pre-Thanksgiving Price Action
contentSnippet: Just when traders got used to price declines on the Wednesday ahead of Turkey Day, bitcoin pulled a reversal higher.

title: From crypto rewards cards to neobanks with EtherFi, Gnosis and Ready
contentSnippet: Executives from EtherFi, Gnosis and Ready unpack how cheap L2s, new fiat rails and self-custody are turning “crypto cards” into global neobanks.

title: Bitcoin miner Hive opens door to $300 million stock sales after record quarter
contentSnippet: The miner’s “dual-engine” strategy uses bitcoin mining income to fund data center buildouts for AI and high-performance computing.

title: XLM Edges Higher 2.6% to $0.25 as U.S. Bank Tests Stablecoin Pilot
contentSnippet: Major banking institution selects XLM network for programmable digital currency pilot program

title: South Korea's Top Crypto Exchange to Be Absorbed By Tech Giant in $10.3 Billion Deal
contentSnippet: The pending merger, between Upbit owner Dunamu and payments giant Naver, is reportedly focused on the booming stablecoin sector.

title: Hedera Jumps 1% Breaking Through $0.143 Resistance
contentSnippet: Institutional accumulation drives HBAR above key technical levels as futures launch approaches.

title: Robinhood Stock Rises Following Deal That Could Boost Its Prediction Market Push
contentSnippet: Trading app Robinhood may be looking to launch its own prediction market platform, analysts say, following a newly announced acquisition.

title: DeFi’s $55B Plunge Isn’t the Disaster It Looks Like
contentSnippet: Despite a sharp $55 billion decline in total value locked since October, the DeFi sector remains structurally strong, with rising DEX activity and steadily growing protocol fundamentals.

title: DWF Labs launches ‘proprietary’ $75 million DeFi investment fund
contentSnippet: DWF will invest in founders “solving real structural problems in liquidity, settlement, credit, and on-chain risk management."

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT, Citing Falling Bitcoin Prices as Risk
contentSnippet: The ratings agency cited bitcoin's rising share in the stablecoin reserves, making USDT vulnerable to falling prices.

title: Turmoil inside World Liberty-based crypto treasury includes investigations, firings and Rwandan money laundering conviction
contentSnippet: The story paints a picture of a company experiencing intense turmoil since deciding in August to pivot to a digital asset treasury strategy.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Loads Up on Google, Coinbase, Circle and Bitcoin ETF Shares
contentSnippet: Tech investor Cathie Wood's investment firm remains bullish on crypto and AI, adding shares of Google, Coinbase, and a Bitcoin ETF on Tuesday.

title: Grayscale Files to Launch Zcash ETF After Privacy Coin's 1,000% Price Surge
contentSnippet: Grayscale is riding the recent Zcash hype with plans to convert its trust into an ETF.

title: Crypto Long & Short: The Striking Dichotomy in DeFi Tokens Post 10/10
contentSnippet: In this week’s Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Martin Gaspar shares a snapshot of where we are post 10/10 and where potential opportunities from dislocations may lie. Then, we take a look at investor

title: Polymarket can now operate in US! Texas buys $5M BTC! MON up another 24%!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were slightly red, with BTC down 1% at $86,600 and ETH down 1% at $2,910, while BNB gained 1% to $856 and SOL held steady at $136. Among top movers, MON (+24%), SPX (+13%), and IP (+7%)

title: Avail’s Nexus Mainnet goes live, targeting unified liquidity across multiple blockchains
contentSnippet: The network introduces intent-based routing and multi-source liquidity, with unified verification expected later through Avail DA.

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Stall as Traders Brace for Holiday Volatility
contentSnippet: Crypto markets stagnate as traders eye potential Thanksgiving volatility, with a $2B options bet signaling a capped Bitcoin rally.

title: Morning Minute: Polymarket Gets the Green Light; Kalshi Hits a Wall
contentSnippet: Mixed news for prediction markets as the CFTC approved Polymarket, while a Nevada ruling set back Kalshi and likely the sector in the U.S.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.
